KnowledgeItem.Title: JiraCreateIssueManage
KnowledgeItem.Description: Initiates the workflow for creating an issue in Jira

IssueCondition.Description: Searches for an Issue with DataBlock JIRACREATEISSUE and triggers the workflow for sucessful completion

Activate.XMLExtract:
<NewBlock><Tasks
		           TargetMachine=${JMI:TargetMachine}      
			   TargetState=Created
			   User=${JMI:User}
			   Lib=RESTPOST
			   ToolUrl='${JMI:JiraUrl}'
			   Host=${JMI:Host}
			   CurrentState=ReadState
			   ToolUser=${JMI:JiraUser}
			   ToolPasswd=${JMI:JiraPassword}
			   PostData='{"fields":{"project":{"key":"${JMI:ProjectKey}"},"summary":"${JMI:Summary}" ,"description":"${JMI:Description}","issuetype":{"name":"${JMI:IssueType}"}}}'
			   TaskNumber=${PROTASKS:NumberTotal}
			   ContentType='Content-Type:application/json'
			 /> </NewBlock>
